timeline.bodyText: Any opinions about the scale? I'm not sure if I ever got it right to hardcode it as 6 to not truncating any nano seconds in the LocalTime parameter.
timeline.author: BillyYccc

replies.bodyText: I filed #752 to make sure we analyze and take any action needed.
replies.author: tsegismont
